job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree/University degree in computer science or computer applications

jd: Hi,This is Chandra from Yochana IT Solutions, I Recently found your resume in one of our Job portal and We are looking for “Java Developer with Azure Exp, New Castle, DE(Hybrid)” with one of our client, I have included the job information below, If you are interested, please share your updated resume.Job Description:Azure Java EE DeveloperSkills required:OTCnet Azure Java EE Developer RequirementsRequired Knowledge and ExperienceExperience in large scale enterprise apps developmentExperience in Java SE, Java EE, Tomcat, WebLogic, SQL for Oracle/PostgreSQL databases, Spring Boot, Spring Framework, JBPM, MyBatis, Hibernate, JSF, ReactJS, REST/SOAP API development, Microservices, and design patterns.Experience with Microsoft Azure Cloud native development with knowledge of DevOps, Security, Azure configuration, Azure SDK, serverless, App service, functions, compute and container deployments, docker, Kubernetes, API Management, Ansible scripting, DevOps, CI/CD pipeline, Setting up static and dynamic code analysis and app analysis tools.If you are unable to find Azure Java EE Developer, we can also accept AWS Java EE developer or GCP Java EE Developer assuming that the developer will acquire the skills and expertise in Azure within six months of joining.Apart from the detailed JD in below mail, other requirementsBachelor’s degree/University degree in computer science or computer applicationsThis role needs security clearanceThree days Work from Office in New Castle, Delaware Thanks & Regards,Chandra Sekhar Prathipati – Resource SpecialistYochana IT Solutions Inc.Email: chandra@yochana.com Address: 23000 Commerce Drive, Farmington Hills, MI 48335www.yochana.com/-https://www.linkedin.com/in/chandra-shekhar-61a0731a8/
